name: Evidence Pursuers
description: This is our game that we made for our RAFT project for school. It is based on the question: Which ideal from the Declaration of Independence is most important? In this 2 player space game, player 1 fights for natural rights and player 2 fights for the right to alter or abolish government.  To get points, you must collect evidence that supports your cause. If you collect evidence that does not support your cause, you will lose some points and take damage to your ship. The first player to get 30 points wins. If you take too much damage to your ship, losing all three of your lives, you will lose. Good luck commanders.
